name: Reconnaissance Marines Pointer {Generation Kill}
description:
replaces the normal colored arrow, pointing to the corresponding pages you click on; dashboard, tumblelog, messages, help etc, to a recon Marines insignia. (tested on chrome and firefox, but if there's any problems, you can message me here)

base code credit to: http://userstyles.org/styles/49928/tumblr-extras-heart-selector
band of brothers jump wings pointer: http://userstyles.org/styles/56690/airborne-jump-wings-pointer-band-of-brother
the pacific Marines (globe&anchor) pointer: http://userstyles.org/styles/56723/marines-globe-anchor-pointer-the-pacific
